typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as long,
		HOUSEHOLD_ID as integer,
		CARD_NUMBER as long,
		CURRENT_SEGMENT_NAME as string,
		PRIMARY_CARD_FLAG as string,
		CUSTOMER_NAME as string,
		ADDRESS_STATUS as string,
		CUSTOMER_ADDRESS as string,
		CUSTOMER_PHONE as string,
		HOUSEHOLD_CITY as string,
		HOUSEHOLD_POSTAL_CODE as string,
		CARD_TYPE as string,
		NEW_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG as string,
		EMAIL_STATUS as string,
		CARD_EMAIL as string,
		ECOMM_EMAIL as string,
		SEND_EMAIL_FLAG as string,
		SEND_MAIL_FLAG as string,
		TM_CARD_FLAG as string,
		TM_LOCATION_NUMBER as integer,
		TM_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG as string,
		CARD_ISSUE_DATE as string,
		FIRST_SHOP_DATE as string,
		LAST_SHOP_DATE as string,
		PRIMARY_STORE_NUMBER as integer,
		FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE as string,
		LAST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE as string,
		PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER as integer,
		HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE as string,
		HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE as string,
		HOUSEHOLD_ECOMM_TYPE as string,
		HOUSEHOLD_SHOPPING_CHANEL as string,
		LIFETIME_POINTS_TOTAL as integer,
		LIFETIME_POINTS_REDEEM as integer,
		LIFETIME_SPEND as float,
		CURRENT_POINTS_BALANCE as integer,
		DATE_OF_BIRTH as string,
		AGE as integer,
		AGE_GROUP as string,
		LAST_CHANGED as string,
		LAST_DML as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CustomerParquetSCD
source(output(
		Customer_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Household_Id as integer,
		Current_Household_Id as integer,
		Current_Card_Number as long,
		Current_Segment_Name as string,
		Current_Current_Segment_Name as string,
		Primary_Card_Flag as string,
		Current_Primary_Card_Flag as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Current_Customer_Name as string,
		Address_Status as string,
		Current_Address_Status as string,
		Customer_Address as string,
		Current_Customer_Address as string,
		Current_Customer_Phone as string,
		Household_City as string,
		Current_Household_City as string,
		Household_Postal_Code as string,
		Current_Household_Postal_Code as string,
		Card_Type as string,
		Current_Card_Type as string,
		New_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_New_Household_Flag as string,
		Email_Status as string,
		Current_Email_Status as string,
		Current_Card_Email as string,
		Current_Ecomm_Email as string,
		Send_Email_Flag as string,
		Current_Send_Email_Flag as string,
		Send_Mail_Flag as string,
		Current_Send_Mail_Flag as string,
		TM_Card_Flag as string,
		Current_TM_Card_Flag as string,
		TM_Location_Number as integer,
		Current_TM_Location_Number as integer,
		TM_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_TM_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_Card_Issue_Date as date,
		Current_First_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_Last_Shop_Date as date,
		Primary_Store_Number as integer,
		Current_Primary_Store_Number as integer,
		Current_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_Last_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number as integer,
		Current_Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number as integer,
		HHN_First_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_HHN_First_Shop_Date as date,
		HHN_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_HHN_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Household_Ecomm_Type as string,
		Current_Household_Ecomm_Type as string,
		Household_Shopping_Chanel as string,
		Current_Household_Shopping_Chanel as string,
		Current_Lifetime_Points_Total as integer,
		Current_Lifetime_Points_Redeem as integer,
		Current_Lifetime_Spend as double,
		Current_Points_Balance as integer,
		Current_Current_Points_Balance as integer,
		Current_Date_Of_Birth as string,
		Current_Age as integer,
		Current_Age_Group as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as string,
		Eff_Start_Dt as date,
		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['internal/LDW/Parquet/Customer-DIM/CUSTOMER/Final/*.parquet']) ~> CustomerDIM
CustomerDIM select(mapColumn(
		TGT_Customer_Surrogate_ID = Customer_Surrogate_Id,
		TGT_ID = ID,
		TGT_HOUSEHOLD_ID = Household_Id,
		TGT_Current_HOUSEHOLD_ID = Current_Household_Id,
		TGT_Current_CARD_NUMBER = Current_Card_Number,
		TGT_CURRENT_SEGMENT_NAME = Current_Segment_Name,
		TGT_Current_CURRENT_SEGMENT_NAME = Current_Current_Segment_Name,
		TGT_PRIMARY_CARD_FLAG = Primary_Card_Flag,
		TGT_Current_PRIMARY_CARD_FLAG = Current_Primary_Card_Flag,
		TGT_CUSTOMER_NAME = Customer_Name,
		TGT_Current_CUSTOMER_NAME = Current_Customer_Name,
		TGT_ADDRESS_STATUS = Address_Status,
		TGT_Current_ADDRESS_STATUS = Current_Address_Status,
		TGT_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS = Customer_Address,
		TGT_Current_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS = Current_Customer_Address,
		TGT_Current_CUSTOMER_PHONE = Current_Customer_Phone,
		TGT_HOUSEHOLD_CITY = Household_City,
		TGT_Current_HOUSEHOLD_CITY = Current_Household_City,
		TGT_HOUSEHOLD_POSTAL_CODE = Household_Postal_Code,
		TGT_Current_HOUSEHOLD_POSTAL_CODE = Current_Household_Postal_Code,
		TGT_CARD_TYPE = Card_Type,
		TGT_Current_CARD_TYPE = Current_Card_Type,
		TGT_NEW_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG = New_Household_Flag,
		TGT_Current_NEW_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG = Current_New_Household_Flag,
		TGT_EMAIL_STATUS = Email_Status,
		TGT_Current_EMAIL_STATUS = Current_Email_Status,
		TGT_Current_CARD_EMAIL = Current_Card_Email,
		TGT_Current_ECOMM_EMAIL = Current_Ecomm_Email,
		TGT_SEND_EMAIL_FLAG = Send_Email_Flag,
		TGT_Current_SEND_EMAIL_FLAG = Current_Send_Email_Flag,
		TGT_SEND_MAIL_FLAG = Send_Mail_Flag,
		TGT_Current_SEND_MAIL_FLAG = Current_Send_Mail_Flag,
		TGT_TM_CARD_FLAG = TM_Card_Flag,
		TGT_Current_TM_CARD_FLAG = Current_TM_Card_Flag,
		TGT_TM_LOCATION_NUMBER = TM_Location_Number,
		TGT_Current_TM_LOCATION_NUMBER = Current_TM_Location_Number,
		TGT_TM_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG = TM_Household_Flag,
		TGT_Current_TM_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG = Current_TM_Household_Flag,
		TGT_Current_CARD_ISSUE_DATE = Current_Card_Issue_Date,
		TGT_Current_FIRST_SHOP_DATE = Current_First_Shop_Date,
		TGT_Current_LAST_SHOP_DATE = Current_Last_Shop_Date,
		TGT_PRIMARY_STORE_NUMBER = Primary_Store_Number,
		TGT_Current_PRIMARY_STORE_NUMBER = Current_Primary_Store_Number,
		TGT_Current_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE = Current_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date,
		TGT_Current_LAST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE = Current_Last_Ecomm_Shop_Date,
		TGT_PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER = Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number,
		TGT_Current_PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER = Current_Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number,
		TGT_HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE = HHN_First_Shop_Date,
		TGT_Current_HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE = Current_HHN_First_Shop_Date,
		TGT_HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE = HHN_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date,
		TGT_Current_HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE = Current_HHN_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date,
		TGT_HOUSEHOLD_ECOMM_TYPE = Household_Ecomm_Type,
		TGT_Current_HOUSEHOLD_ECOMM_TYPE = Current_Household_Ecomm_Type,
		TGT_HOUSEHOLD_SHOPPING_CHANEL = Household_Shopping_Chanel,
		TGT_Current_HOUSEHOLD_SHOPPING_CHANEL = Current_Household_Shopping_Chanel,
		TGT_Current_LIFETIME_POINTS_TOTAL = Current_Lifetime_Points_Total,
		TGT_Current_LIFETIME_POINTS_REDEEM = Current_Lifetime_Points_Redeem,
		TGT_Current_LIFETIME_SPEND = Current_Lifetime_Spend,
		TGT_CURRENT_POINTS_BALANCE = Current_Points_Balance,
		TGT_Current_CURRENT_POINTS_BALANCE = Current_Current_Points_Balance,
		TGT_Current_DATE_OF_BIRTH = Current_Date_Of_Birth,
		TGT_Current_AGE = Current_Age,
		TGT_Current_AGE_GROUP = Current_Age_Group,
		TGT_LAST_CHANGED = Last_Changed,
		TGT_LAST_DML = Last_Dml,
		TGT_EFF_START_DT = Eff_Start_Dt,
		TGT_EFF_END_DT = Eff_End_Dt,
		TGT_IsActive = IsActive,
		TGT_CRC_VAL = Crc_Val
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTGT
DerivedColumnConvertDate derive(IsActive = 1,
		EFF_START_DT = toDate('1900-01-01'),
		EFF_END_DT = toDate('9999-12-31'),
		CRCVAL = case(isNull(ID),TGT_CRC_VAL,md5(HOUSEHOLD_ID,CURRENT_SEGMENT_NAME,PRIMARY_CARD_FLAG,CUSTOMER_NAME,ADDRESS_STATUS,CUSTOMER_ADDRESS,HOUSEHOLD_CITY,HOUSEHOLD_POSTAL_CODE,CARD_TYPE,NEW_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG,EMAIL_STATUS,SEND_EMAIL_FLAG,SEND_MAIL_FLAG,TM_CARD_FLAG,TM_LOCATION_NUMBER,TM_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG,PRIMARY_STORE_NUMBER,PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER,o_HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,o_HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,HOUSEHOLD_ECOMM_TYPE,HOUSEHOLD_SHOPPING_CHANEL))) ~> DerivedColumnCRCVAL
SelectTGT aggregate(MAXVAL = max(TGT_Customer_Surrogate_ID)) ~> AGGMAXVAL
CustomerParquetSCD, AGGMAXVAL join(1 == 1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSRCMaxTGTKey
DerivedColumnCRCVAL split((isNull(TGT_Customer_Surrogate_ID)  && toInteger(LAST_DML)>=0) || (not(isNull(TGT_Customer_Surrogate_ID)) && CRCVAL != TGT_CRC_VAL  && IsActive==1 ),
	(not(isNull(TGT_Customer_Surrogate_ID)) && CRCVAL == TGT_CRC_VAL) && IsActive == 1,
	not(isNull(TGT_Customer_Surrogate_ID)) && toInteger(LAST_DML) < 0,
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@(SurrogateKey, NoSurrogateKey, Delete)
FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@SurrogateKey keyGenerate(output(SurrogateKey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> CreateSurrogateKey
DerivedColumnSurrogateKey split(isNull(TGT_Customer_Surrogate_ID)  && toInteger(LAST_DML)>=0,
	not(isNull(TGT_Customer_Surrogate_ID)) && CRCVAL != TGT_CRC_VAL  && toInteger(LAST_DML)>=0 && TGT_IsActive == 1,
	not(isNull(TGT_Customer_Surrogate_ID)) && CRCVAL != TGT_CRC_VAL  && toInteger(LAST_DML)>=0 && TGT_IsActive == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> NewChange@(NewRecords, SCD2, SCDExpiry)
CreateSurrogateKey derive(out_SurrogateKey = toInteger(SurrogateKey) + iifNull(MAXVAL,0,MAXVAL)) ~> DerivedColumnSurrogateKey
NewChange@SCD2 derive(expiry_EFF_END_DATE = currentDate()) ~> Expiry
FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@Delete derive(delete_EFF_END_DATE = currentDate(),
		delete_inactive = 0) ~> DerivedColumnDelete
JoinSRCMaxTGTKey, SelectTGT join(ID == TGT_ID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSrcTgt
NewChange@SCD2 derive(scd_EFF_START_DT = currentDate()) ~> DerivedSCD2
Expiry, NewChange@SCDExpiry union(byName: true)~> UnionExpiry
UnionExpiry derive(final_EFF_END_DT = case(TGT_IsActive == 0,TGT_EFF_END_DT,expiry_EFF_END_DATE),
		Inactive = 0) ~> DerivedColumn2
FindNewUpdateDeleteRecords@NoSurrogateKey derive(del_EFF_END_DATE = case(toInteger(LAST_DML)<0 && TGT_EFF_END_DT < currentDate(),TGT_EFF_END_DT,
toInteger(LAST_DML)<0 && TGT_EFF_END_DT > currentDate(),currentDate()
, TGT_EFF_END_DT),
		del_inactive = case(toInteger(LAST_DML)<0,0,TGT_IsActive),
		del_LAST_DML = case(toInteger(LAST_DML)<0,LAST_DML,TGT_LAST_DML)) ~> DerivedColumn3
JoinSrcTgt sort(asc(ID, false)) ~> SortSrcID
SortSrcID derive(o_HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE = case(isNull(HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE),toDate(HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
case (length(HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE)==10,toDate(HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'), toDate('01/01/9999','MM/dd/yyyy')
)),
		o_CARD_ISSUE_DATE = case(isNull(CARD_ISSUE_DATE),toDate(CARD_ISSUE_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
case (length(CARD_ISSUE_DATE)==10,toDate(CARD_ISSUE_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'), toDate('01/01/9999','MM/dd/yyyy')
)),
		o_HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE = case(isNull(HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE),toDate(HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
case (length(HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE)==10,toDate(HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'), toDate('01/01/9999','MM/dd/yyyy')
)),
		o_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE = case(isNull(FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE),toDate(FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
case (length(FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE)==10,toDate(FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'), toDate('01/01/9999','MM/dd/yyyy')
)),
		o_LAST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE = case(isNull(LAST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE),toDate(LAST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
case (length(LAST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE)==10,toDate(LAST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'), toDate('01/01/9999','MM/dd/yyyy')
)),
		o_FIRST_SHOP_DATE = case(isNull(FIRST_SHOP_DATE),toDate(FIRST_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
case (length(FIRST_SHOP_DATE)==10,toDate(FIRST_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'), toDate('01/01/9999','MM/dd/yyyy')
)),
		o_LAST_SHOP_DATE = case(isNull(LAST_SHOP_DATE),toDate(LAST_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
case (length(LAST_SHOP_DATE)==10,toDate(LAST_SHOP_DATE,'MM/dd/yyyy'), toDate('01/01/9999','MM/dd/yyyy')
))) ~> DerivedColumnConvertDate
NewChange@NewRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Customer_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Household_Id as integer,
		Current_Household_Id as integer,
		Current_Card_Number as long,
		Current_Segment_Name as string,
		Current_Current_Segment_Name as string,
		Primary_Card_Flag as string,
		Current_Primary_Card_Flag as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Current_Customer_Name as string,
		Address_Status as string,
		Current_Address_Status as string,
		Customer_Address as string,
		Current_Customer_Address as string,
		Current_Customer_Phone as string,
		Household_City as string,
		Current_Household_City as string,
		Household_Postal_Code as string,
		Current_Household_Postal_Code as string,
		Card_Type as string,
		Current_Card_Type as string,
		New_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_New_Household_Flag as string,
		Email_Status as string,
		Current_Email_Status as string,
		Current_Card_Email as string,
		Current_Ecomm_Email as string,
		Send_Email_Flag as string,
		Current_Send_Email_Flag as string,
		Send_Mail_Flag as string,
		Current_Send_Mail_Flag as string,
		TM_Card_Flag as string,
		Current_TM_Card_Flag as string,
		TM_Location_Number as integer,
		Current_TM_Location_Number as integer,
		TM_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_TM_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_Card_Issue_Date as date,
		Current_First_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_Last_Shop_Date as date,
		Primary_Store_Number as integer,
		Current_Primary_Store_Number as integer,
		Current_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_Last_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number as integer,
		Current_Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number as integer,
		HHN_First_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_HHN_First_Shop_Date as date,
		HHN_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_HHN_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Household_Ecomm_Type as string,
		Current_Household_Ecomm_Type as string,
		Household_Shopping_Chanel as string,
		Current_Household_Shopping_Chanel as string,
		Current_Lifetime_Points_Total as integer,
		Current_Lifetime_Points_Redeem as integer,
		Current_Lifetime_Spend as double,
		Current_Points_Balance as integer,
		Current_Current_Points_Balance as integer,
		Current_Date_Of_Birth as string,
		Current_Age as integer,
		Current_Age_Group as string,
		Last_Changed as string,
		Last_Dml as string,
		Eff_Start_Dt as date,
		Eff_End_Dt as date,
		IsActive as integer,
		Crc_Val as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['CustomerDIM_New.parquet'],
	saveOrder: 2,
	mapColumn(
		Customer_Surrogate_Id = out_SurrogateKey,
		ID,
		Household_Id = HOUSEHOLD_ID,
		Current_Household_Id = HOUSEHOLD_ID,
		Current_Card_Number = CARD_NUMBER,
		Current_Segment_Name = CURRENT_SEGMENT_NAME,
		Current_Current_Segment_Name = CURRENT_SEGMENT_NAME,
		Primary_Card_Flag = PRIMARY_CARD_FLAG,
		Current_Primary_Card_Flag = PRIMARY_CARD_FLAG,
		Customer_Name = CUSTOMER_NAME,
		Current_Customer_Name = CUSTOMER_NAME,
		Address_Status = ADDRESS_STATUS,
		Current_Address_Status = ADDRESS_STATUS,
		Customer_Address = CUSTOMER_ADDRESS,
		Current_Customer_Address = CUSTOMER_ADDRESS,
		Current_Customer_Phone = CUSTOMER_PHONE,
		Household_City = HOUSEHOLD_CITY,
		Current_Household_City = HOUSEHOLD_CITY,
		Household_Postal_Code = HOUSEHOLD_POSTAL_CODE,
		Current_Household_Postal_Code = HOUSEHOLD_POSTAL_CODE,
		Card_Type = CARD_TYPE,
		Current_Card_Type = CARD_TYPE,
		New_Household_Flag = NEW_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG,
		Current_New_Household_Flag = NEW_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG,
		Email_Status = EMAIL_STATUS,
		Current_Email_Status = EMAIL_STATUS,
		Current_Card_Email = CARD_EMAIL,
		Current_Ecomm_Email = ECOMM_EMAIL,
		Send_Email_Flag = SEND_EMAIL_FLAG,
		Current_Send_Email_Flag = SEND_EMAIL_FLAG,
		Send_Mail_Flag = SEND_MAIL_FLAG,
		Current_Send_Mail_Flag = SEND_MAIL_FLAG,
		TM_Card_Flag = TM_CARD_FLAG,
		Current_TM_Card_Flag = TM_CARD_FLAG,
		TM_Location_Number = TM_LOCATION_NUMBER,
		Current_TM_Location_Number = TM_LOCATION_NUMBER,
		TM_Household_Flag = TM_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG,
		Current_TM_Household_Flag = TM_HOUSEHOLD_FLAG,
		Current_Card_Issue_Date = o_CARD_ISSUE_DATE,
		Current_First_Shop_Date = o_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,
		Current_Last_Shop_Date = o_LAST_SHOP_DATE,
		Primary_Store_Number = PRIMARY_STORE_NUMBER,
		Current_Primary_Store_Number = PRIMARY_STORE_NUMBER,
		Current_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date = o_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,
		Current_Last_Ecomm_Shop_Date = o_LAST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,
		Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number = PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER,
		Current_Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number = PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER,
		HHN_First_Shop_Date = o_HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,
		Current_HHN_First_Shop_Date = o_HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,
		HHN_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date = o_HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,
		Current_HHN_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date = o_HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,
		Household_Ecomm_Type = HOUSEHOLD_ECOMM_TYPE,
		Current_Household_Ecomm_Type = HOUSEHOLD_ECOMM_TYPE,
		Household_Shopping_Chanel = HOUSEHOLD_SHOPPING_CHANEL,
		Current_Household_Shopping_Chanel = HOUSEHOLD_SHOPPING_CHANEL,
		Current_Lifetime_Points_Total = LIFETIME_POINTS_TOTAL,
		Current_Lifetime_Points_Redeem = LIFETIME_POINTS_REDEEM,
		Current_Lifetime_Spend = LIFETIME_SPEND,
		Current_Points_Balance = CURRENT_POINTS_BALANCE,
		Current_Current_Points_Balance = CURRENT_POINTS_BALANCE,
		Current_Date_Of_Birth = DATE_OF_BIRTH,
		Current_Age = AGE,
		Current_Age_Group = AGE_GROUP,
		Last_Changed = LAST_CHANGED,
		Last_Dml = LAST_DML,
		Eff_Start_Dt = EFF_START_DT,
		Eff_End_Dt = EFF_END_DT,
		IsActive,
		Crc_Val = CRCVAL
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkNew
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Customer_Surrogate_Id as long,
		ID as long,
		Household_Id as integer,
		Current_Household_Id as integer,
		Current_Card_Number as long,
		Current_Segment_Name as string,
		Current_Current_Segment_Name as string,
		Primary_Card_Flag as string,
		Current_Primary_Card_Flag as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Current_Customer_Name as string,
		Address_Status as string,
		Current_Address_Status as string,
		Customer_Address as string,
		Current_Customer_Address as string,
		Current_Customer_Phone as string,
		Household_City as string,
		Current_Household_City as string,
		Household_Postal_Code as string,
		Current_Household_Postal_Code as string,
		Card_Type as string,
		Current_Card_Type as string,
		New_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_New_Household_Flag as string,
		Email_Status as string,
		Current_Email_Status as string,
		Current_Card_Email as string,
		Current_Ecomm_Email as string,
		Send_Email_Flag as string,
		Current_Send_Email_Flag as string,
		Send_Mail_Flag as string,
		Current_Send_Mail_Flag as string,
		TM_Card_Flag as string,
		Current_TM_Card_Flag as string,
		TM_Location_Number as integer,
		Current_TM_Location_Number as integer,
		TM_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_TM_Household_Flag as string,
		Current_Card_Issue_Date as date,
		Current_First_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_Last_Shop_Date as date,
		Primary_Store_Number as integer,
		Current_Primary_Store_Number as integer,
		Current_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,
		Current_Last_Ecomm_Shop_Date as date,

		Current_Card_Issue_Date = o_CARD_ISSUE_DATE,
		Current_First_Shop_Date = o_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,

		Primary_Store_Number = PRIMARY_STORE_NUMBER,

		Current_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date = o_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,
		Current_Last_Ecomm_Shop_Date = o_LAST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,
		Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number = PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER,
		Current_Primary_Ecomm_Store_Number = PRIMARY_ECOMM_STORE_NUMBER,
		HHN_First_Shop_Date = o_HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,
		Current_HHN_First_Shop_Date = o_HHN_FIRST_SHOP_DATE,
		HHN_First_Ecomm_Shop_Date = o_HHN_FIRST_ECOMM_SHOP_DATE,

	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkSCD2
